parameters:
<
[4]>
[1]?\.\. Oh,\. you came!\.\. Come,\. let's sit together...
There she is.\.\. Writing in her "stupid diary" like everything's just fine and nothing's going on.\.\. It's not her brother that's gone missing after all.\.\.
The very sight of her scribbling away in that thing drives Neneko over the edge as she unleashes her anger.\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Calm down?!\.\. He's in the Hole by now!\.\. That's where he is!\.\. How could I...
\n<\n[1]>Oh,\. that's terrible?\.\. Is that what you have to say for yourself?\.\.
\n<\n[1]>He's in the fucking Hole and the only person who could've done something about it just stood by and watched!\.\.
\n<\n[4]>I...!\.\. That's not true!\.\. That's not what I did!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Really?!\.\. Is that what you have to say for yourself!?\.\.
Shina makes a run for it,\. going towards the door,\. but Neneko isn't having any of that.\.\.
Blinded by her anger and frustration,\. she's going to get that apology out of her no matter what.\.\. She's not letting her leave until then.\.\.
\n<\n[1]>What?!\.\. You want me to move out of the way?!\.\. You want me to leave you alone?!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Fucking stand up for yourself for once,\. you useless,\. stupid cow!\.\.
Tears began to form in Shina's eyes who desperately wanted her friend to stop berating her like this.\.\.

<
[1]>Don't '
[1]' me.\.\. You go around and act as if you care about my brother...
\^\n<\n[4]>Please stop this,\. Neneko...\.\.\.think about what you're say-\.\.\.
\n<\n[1]>Oh,\. I'm thinking alright.\.\. I'm thinking and all I'm realizing is that you don't give a shit about him!\.\.
\n<\n[1]>How could that idiot ever fall for someone like you!\.\.\.\. \BST[2]...\.\.\.
A deafening silence falls over the room.\.\. In the following moment,\. Neneko realizes a little too late that she may have crossed a line she shouldn't have.\.\.
She's angry,\. but it wasn't really Shina's fault as much as she made it out to be.\.\. At the end of the day,\. there was only so much she could've done,\. even if she wasn't so meek.\.\.
As she looks into her friend's eyes,\. she starts to see something new take form,\. something she hasn't seen before.\.\.
From the bottomless depths of despair inside Shina's eyes rises a new hope.\.\. A desperate,\. maddened hope.\.\.
\n<\n[4]>I couldn't move because I was a coward.\.\. I tried,\. and tried and I failed,\. because I'm useless like you said.\.\.
A last ditch effort to gain redemption,\. not only from one's peers but more importantly from oneself.\.\.
\n<\n[4]>I think about that every waking moment.\.\. It's all I can think of.\.\. And it haunts me.\.\.
\n<\n[4]>I won't let that be the way either of you two remember me anymore.\.\.
\n<\n[4]>Get out of my way!!\.\. I...\.\.\. \BST[8]I'll get him back!\.\.
With nothing but reckless bravado and sheer frenzy fueling her,\. the once docile Shina shoves her friend aside and rushes out into the wilderness.\.\.
If Neneko had to guess,\. she was rushing out to do something stupid.\.\.
And even worse,\. it was because of the things that she said.\.\.
She was about to lose two people she cared about now.\.\.
"Tomorrow!\.\. Tomorrow is the day.\.\. I will confess to \n[2] and we'll live together as family.\.\. I've promised it to \c[18]her\c[0]!"
To your frustation,\. the little chest in \n[4]'s bedroom is locked.
"Coward!\.\. You'll never confess to him!\.\. You know he hates you,\. but you're fine as long as he doesn't spell it out,\. huh?\.\. They were right,\. you're just an useless COW!"
"Useless! Useless! Useless! Useless! Useless! Useless! Useless!Useless! Useless! Useless! Useless! Useless! Useless! Useless!"

"You're better off alone,\. cow bitch.\.\. Noone wants to be around you,\. not even your "sweet" mom.\.\. Just because \n[2] treats you kindly it doesn't mean he feels anything for you.\.\. You'll only embarass yourself!"
"Just go die in the Hole!\.\. You know how...\.\.\. noone checks the crops going down...\.\.\."
